name: Wood Golem
description: The Wood Golem is a medium-sized construct made of wood, designed as a protector or enforcer. It has considerable physical strength, low intelligence, and sturdy natural armor.
memorable: Notably resilient against many effects, with magic resistance and a form that cannot be altered.
goals: To serve as a protector or enforcer carrying out commands of its creator.
relations: Typically created by a powerful entity, it may be found alongside other constructs or magical beings.
environment: Often found in locations where its creator resides, such as ancient ruins or secluded areas.
strengths: High Strength and Constitution, good physical defense, immunities to poison and psychic damage, resistance to nonmagical attacks.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to fire damage, low intelligence limits complex actions.
attacks: Can make two powerful slam attacks per turn, each dealing substantial bludgeoning damage.
most_powerful_ability: Magic Resistance, providing advantage on saving throws against spells.
additional_information: Immune to conditions such as being charmed, exhausted, or frightened.
Immutable Form prevents alteration by magic.
Capable of absorbing a reasonable amount of damage with high hit points.
Effective melee combatant with a strong attack bonus.
Designed to fulfill commands without deep strategic thinking.
